Further, upon the Effective Date, each of the Released Persons and the Related Persons shall be deemed to have, and by operation of the Judgment shall have, fully, finally, and forever released, relinquished, and discharged each and all of the Plaintiffs, Plaintiffs’ Counsel, and all Current Apple Shareholders (solely in their capacity as Apple shareholders), its Related Persons, and Apple from all claims, debts, demands, rights, or causes of action or liabilities, whether known or unknown, relating to, arising out of, or in connection with the institution, prosecution, assertion, resolution, or Settlement of the Action or the Released Claims.
